Image Resolution Compare

Your Device Pixel Ratio:

Images with a green border are the high-resolution, and images with the red border are the standard-resolution.

Below are some examples of high-resolution and standard-resolution images so you can compare their quality side-by-side. This page does not use javascript to change the image's src, but instead has hard coded src values for the different resolutions for each image.
